server

Class DicServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DicServer

  • public class DicServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Main driver function for the server side. Hold the most responsibility of error handling, format checking, thread initialisation etc. Severe functionality such as shutting the system, is controlled by the driver as well.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main function for the system.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments: [port_number] [path_of_dictionary]

      • getIpAndPort

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,javafx.util.Pair<java.net.InetAddress,java.lang.Integer>> getIpAndPort()
        Return the Ip and port of the client. The map contains the order of the client(for later check if all clients disconnects from the server).
        Returns:
        Hashmap of client order number and ip, port.

      • clientDisconnect

        public void clientDisconnect()
        Method used by the client side to notify the server that the client has shut down the connection.

        Shut down the server and close the server side.
